children.name: start_delay
children.label: Start Delay
children.help_text: The time is seconds till the first notification shows

children.name: show_time
children.label: Show Time
children.help_text: The time In seconds for the notification to show

children.name: delay
children.label: Delay
children.help_text: The time is seconds between showing the next notification

children.name: randomize_delay
children.label: Randomize Delay
children.help_text: Toggle on if you want to randomize the time between notifications

children.name: delay_min
children.label: Delay Min
children.help_text: The minimum time in seconds that that random delay can be

children.name: delay_max
children.label: Delay Max
children.help_text: The maximum time in seconds that that random delay can be
